languages.text:
Выберите действие атаки на панели атак и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы подтвердить выбор. В каждом ходу вы можете использовать все атаки корабля по одному разу.
Во время боя используйте маневры перемещений и атаки разных орудий, чтобы эффективно использовать возможности корабля.

Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.
languages.original_text:
Выберите действие атаки на панели атак и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы подтвердить выбор. В каждом ходу вы можете использовать все атаки корабля по одному разу.
Во время боя используйте маневры перемещений и атаки разных орудий, чтобы эффективно использовать возможности корабля.

traits.locale_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

languages.text:
Elige una acción de ataque en el panel de ataque y confirma tu selección con {console_bind|Confirm}. Cada turno puedes usar todos los ataques de la nave una vez.
Maniobra tu nave en combate y ataca con las diferentes armas para aprovechar al máximo las capacidades de tu nave.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Elige una acción de ataque en el panel de ataque y confirma tu selección con {console_bind|Confirm}. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} puedes usar todos los ataques de la nave una vez.
Maniobra tu nave en combate y ataca con las diferentes armas para aprovechar al máximo las capacidades de tu nave.

languages.text:
攻撃パネルで攻撃アクションを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押して選択を確定する。各ターンごとに、各船の攻撃を使用できる。
戦闘中に船を操作し、さまざまな武器で攻撃して、船の能力を最大限に活用しよう。
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
攻撃パネルで攻撃アクションを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押して選択を確定する。各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに、各船の攻撃を使用できる。
戦闘中に船を操作し、さまざまな武器で攻撃して、船の能力を最大限に活用しよう。

languages.text:
您可以在攻击面板上选择任意攻击指令，之后按{console_bind|Confirm}确认。每个回合中，每种攻击都可以使用一次。
您需要在战斗中操纵舰船，使用各种各样的武器进行攻击，充分发挥舰船的火力。
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
您可以在攻击面板上选择任意攻击指令，之后按{console_bind|Confirm}确认。每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，每种攻击都可以使用一次。
您需要在战斗中操纵舰船，使用各种各样的武器进行攻击，充分发挥舰船的火力。

languages.text:
Wähle eine Angriffsaktion auf dem Panel für Angriffe und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Auswahl zu bestätigen. Pro Runde kannst du jeden der Schiffsangriffe einmal einsetzen.
Manövriere dein Schiff im Kampf und greife mit verschiedenen Waffen an, um die Fähigkeiten deines Schiffes optimal auszunutzen.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Wähle eine Angriffsaktion auf dem Panel für Angriffe und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Auswahl zu bestätigen. Pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} kannst du jeden der Schiffsangriffe einmal einsetzen.
Manövriere dein Schiff im Kampf und greife mit verschiedenen Waffen an, um die Fähigkeiten deines Schiffes optimal auszunutzen.

languages.text:
Sélectionnez une action d'attaque dans le panneau des attaques et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour valider votre sélection. À chaque tour, vous pouvez utiliser chaque attaque du vaisseau une fois.
Au combat, manœuvrez votre vaisseau et attaquez à l'aide de différentes armes pour tirer le meilleur parti des capacités de votre appareil.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:

Au combat, manœuvrez votre vaisseau et attaquez à l’aide de différentes armes pour tirer le meilleur parti des capacités de votre vaisseau.

languages.text:
Saldırı panelindeki bir saldırı eylemini seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine basarak seçimini onayla. Bir tur içinde, geminin saldırılarından her birini bir kez kullanabilirsin.
Çatışmalarda geminin imkânlarından en iyi şekilde yararlanmak için manevralar yap ve farklı silahlarla saldır.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the attacks panel and press {console_bind|Confirm} to confirm your selection. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
